name: Shitty Wizard Installer
description:
Welcome to the Shitty Wizzard Installer

Do you want to play the wonderfull and revolutionary game of Gobbler ?

Well, you'll have to install it first. With the SWInstaller, this process should be easy as pie.

If, for what ever reason, the process would stop, the SWInstaller provide a way to install the game manually.

Sources are available at 

https://github.com/Redoxee/AutoClicker
